name: RIKSOF
tagline: A Mobile and Web App Development Company
description: Over the 10 years of our existence, we have refined our ways of delivering processes and products to clients according to their needs. Our agile approach encompasses software development and our approach in business with you. We are keen to assist you through call or in person. We do make mistakes but compensate them by doing full disclosure. A win-win situation is a goal that we achieve with the help of cost-cutting and long-term relationships.
